entry.title: The Demon Spawn Surveillance Strategy (The DSSS) ~ BRIEF HIATUS ~
entry.summary:
Author: YourLocalGothamite

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,289Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 463

Summary: It starts with Jon Kent's horrible lies.It ends with three grown (only physically) men in tactical gear, desperately clinging to a rooftop, watching Damian Wayne get his cheeks squished (!!??) by a girl (WHAT!!???) in a pink hoodie. The Batboys started to notice something was off with Damian, all because of Jon. Damian would come up with weird excuses. Disappearing. Showing up with a weird look in his eye. (??) So naturally, they did what any loving brothers would do: launched a full-scale spy mission. The DSSS includes but is not limited to:- Unauthorized rooftop stakeouts- Theoretical witchcraft accusations- A whiteboard- Red string- Glitter glueAnd many more. Stay tuned for the emotional rollercoaster Damian unknowingly sends his brothers on ;).

entry.title: The robin and the jellyfish
entry.summary:
Author: Bellies_wellies

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,080Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 52

Summary: After defeating Gaea, Pandora Jackson, younger sister of Percy, returns to her quote-on-quote ‚Äúnormal life‚Äù at Gotham Academy. Going through the normal teenage angst mixed with serious PTSD and stuck-up rich kids, she‚Äôs got enough problems to deal with. So having Damian Wayne, her ‚Äúmutually beneficial acquaintance,‚Äù walk in on her fighting a monster‚Äîand him being able to see it‚Äîcauses a whole lot more problems. Nothing in life has ever been easy, but it‚Äôd be nice to catch some sort of a break. Will she remain just acquaintances with Damian? Will he share his secret and traumas? Or will their tentative friendship end with the new challenges thrown their way? (Title is subject to change cause I suck at naming things lol)

entry.title: Beware the Nightmares on the Land and Sea
entry.summary:
Author: HotaruKurosawa

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,150Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 14

Summary: One day, your life took a turn. For better or worse, you haven't decided yet. What you do know is that there are things on this planet that you never even knew existed. Things that your mind could never even imagine. Yet, here you are. Now, you must rebuild your life whilst trying to navigate this new one involving heroes and villains alike. Not to mention navigating the normal world and the magic one, as you possess a power that others could only dream of having. Whilst you are uncertain of how to navigate these changes in your life, these few things are certain. Don't go into the water past your knees.If you saw something that seemed abnormal, no you didn't.If you hear voices in your head, it will pass. Don't fully trust their advice.No matter what you do with your life, remember, it's not just yours that hangs in the balance.And lastly, whatever you do, don't have sex. These are the things you have to follow by to get through this life. If you don't, it won't be just you who deals with the consequences. Oh, and don't forget. The Eldritch Being inside of your chest is watching everything you do. Try not to disappoint her. Your Choices Matter.

entry.title: Under Protection
entry.summary:
Author: Nightly_Darkk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,297Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 35

Summary: The mission sounded simple at first: protect Gotham's most infamous vigilantes in their civilian skins. The reality? Nothing is simple in Wayne Manor. The secrets there cling like shadows to the wall and for all of Batman's insistence of strategy, it's starting to feel a lot more like scheming. The BatBoys are restless, sharp, always watching. Constantly bristling at the idea of being protected.And in the middle of it all is her. A girl so unaware of the storm coming closer to her door each day. She isn't supposed to be there. She isn't even supposed to matter. But she does- and no one can say why. The was told to protect them. Nobody said what they'd have to protect themselves from.
